content.question: The views of power expressed by Richelieu are best understood as an early example of which of the following developments?

choices.label: The establishment of absolutist principles of monarchical government across Europe
The protection of traditional rights by a coalition of urban and rural interests
The decline of religion as a cause for warfare after the Peace of Westphalia
The growth of religious pluralism as a feature of European politics and society

content.answer: The establishment of absolutist principles of monarchical government across Europe

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
